traceability.evidence: Search of bin/dry-aged-deps.js and src/print-outdated.js shows no parsing or handling of `--update` or `--yes` flags, no code to read/write package.json, no backup creation, no confirmation prompts, and no post-update install reminder. Help text in the CLI does not list `--update` or `--yes`. No tests reference update functionality.
traceability.notes: The auto-update feature (REQ-UPDATE-FLAG, REQ-YES-FLAG, REQ-PREVIEW, REQ-PACKAGE-JSON write, backup, confirmation flow, summary report, install prompt, error handling) is entirely unimplemented.
